articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Exhibition Held by Ministry of People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Exhibition Held by Ministry of People's Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, visited the exhibition of utensils and tools, finishing building materials and sci-tech achievements organized by the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					Displayed there were 131,620 utensils and tools and finishing building materials of 550 varieties made at the construction units and building materials producers of the Korean People's Army and more than 530 scientific and technological achievements.
					
					 Going round the exhibition, Kim Jong Un said that the exhibition has undergone radical changes, compared with the exhibition of utensils and tools two years ago and presents a unique scenery in the golden age of construction and that a great revolution has been brought out in construction.
					
					 Exhibits are suited to the constitution of Koreans and are easy to handle, and the building materials and fixtures and furniture are abundant in varieties and high in quality, he said, calling for a vigorous struggle to increase the proportion of locally available building materials and make them diverse in shape and style, variety and color as required by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The masses have inexhaustible power and wisdom and can make anything if they have a will, he said, urging the officials not to think about purchase of building equipment and materials from other countries but to create and make them in our own style. He underscored the need for society to learn from the fighting spirit and work style displayed by the service personnel.
					
					 Saying that the exhibition marks an important occasion in adding luster to the golden age of construction, the Supreme Leader set forth the tasks to be carried out in the field of construction.
					
					 Accompanying him were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau; Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces of the DPRK; and Army Lieut. General Kim Jong Gwan, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Activists in Construction Field of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Activists in Construction Field of KPA
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with activists in the construction field of the KPA.
					 When he appeared at the venue of the photo session, all the participants enthusiastically welcomed him, expressing highest glory and warmest thanks.
					
					 The respected Supreme Leader warmly congratulated the activists who are working a series of legendary tales about heroic Korea.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied to learn that they built many monumental edifices showing the future of Juche-based architectural art and the level of socialist civilization in the offensive spirit of "at a go" to deal a telling blow at the enemies trying to stifle the DPRK and display the tremendous strength, potentiality for development and valor spirit of socialist Korea.
					
					 He had a picture taken with the activists in the construction field of the KPA.
					
					 Taking part in the photo session were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau; Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces of the DPRK; Army Lieut. General Kim Jong Gwan, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces; and other commanding officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Wonhwa Co-op Farm
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Wonhwa Co-op Farm
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, made a field survey of the Wonhwa Cooperative Farm in Phyongwon County.
					 The officials and peasants of the farm are now making signal successes in rice seedling bed management, rice-transplantation and maize planting.
					
					 Choe went round various parts of the farm to encourage its officials and peasants.
					
					 Learning about the youth sub-work team of the farm, he stressed the need for the youth league organization and young peasants of the farm to enhance their vanguard role in attaining the grain production target for this year.
					
					 He called upon the youth vanguard to take the lead in the farm work with high pride of undertaking the main thrust in turning the country into an economic giant.

articles.title: DPRK Permanent Mission to UN Issues Press Statement
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Mission to UN Issues Press Statement
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The permanent mission of the DPRK to the United Nations on Thursday issued a press statement to clarify the stand of the DPRK government over the fact that the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and the abuse of power by the UNSC Committee, established pursuant to resolution 1718(2006) on the DPRK, have gone to the extremes.
					 Nowadays the U.S. resorts to the foolish scheme to encourage the increased environment for implementation of the "sanction resolutions" against the DPRK, staging such closed briefings by the Committee for each regional group countries at the UN Headquarters one after another, which are unprecedented ever in the UN history, the press statement pointed out, saying:
					
					 The U.S. raises its voice before the member states, claiming that many countries are not fully engaged in implementation of the "sanction resolutions" against the DPRK and even intimidating others into the implementation, openly threatening that member nations would be faced with "strong measures of sanction" if they do not implement or show less interest in fulfilling their obligation to implement the "sanction resolutions".
					
					 This only shows illegality and injustice of the "sanction resolutions" cooked up and imposed by the U.S. against the DPRK.
					
					 It is self-evident truth that there is no need going to the trouble of begging or blackmailing others into the implementation of "resolutions", if they were regarded reasonable, fully based on justice and clear with their legal ground that could be accepted by the international community.
					
					 Besides, there is no other way but to interpret it as the behavior of arrogation that the Security Council Committee established pursuant to resolution 1718(2006) on the DPRK raised questions even on normal trading deals and operation of restaurants between countries as "illegal acts" by overturning interpretation of the UN "resolution", which clearly stipulates that it is not intended to have adverse humanitarian consequences for the civilian population of the DPRK or to affect negatively those activities, including economic activities and cooperation.
					
					 It will be only a laughing stock of the international community that with hysteria about sanctions, the U.S. has mistaken even ordinary restaurants run by the DPRK abroad for nuke or ballistic rocket manufacturers, so frightened at the tremendous military strength of the DPRK with nuclear force as a pivot, and the Security Council Committee established pursuant to resolution 1718(2006) on the DPRK has been reduced to the mere tool of executing U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 If the UNSC considers that its "sanction resolutions" are legitimate, then there will be no reason for it not to meet the repeated demand of the DPRK for an international forum of legal experts to clarify the legal basis of the "resolutions".
					
					 The UNSC, before it forces other countries to implement the "resolutions", should reconsider why they are not being implemented and should try to clarify their legality in the proposed forum.
					
					 The DPRK government determines such crazy hostile acts being committed by the U.S. and the Security Council Committee established pursuant to resolution 1718(2006) on the DPRK under the pretext of sanctions as a heinous crime against humanity aimed to trample down the sovereignty of the DPRK and its people's right to existence and thus pull the country back into the life of dark age, disregarding the basics of the international law and common sense of legitimate trade deals among countries, and therefore totally rejects such kinds of "resolutions".

articles.title: Conservative Group of South Korean Should Be Thrown Overboard: Spokesman for CCNR
articles.content:
Conservative Group of South Korean Should Be Thrown Overboard: Spokesman for CCNR
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- For the sake of the country and the nation and for the sound development and future of the south Korean society, the south Korean puppet conservative group should be completely thrown overboard.
					 A spokesman for the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation (CCNR) says this in a statement on Saturday.
					
					 Recalling that the south Korean group of conservatives are seeking a way out of a quagmire after being sternly punished by history for committing thrice-cursed crimes against the public mindset and the trend of the times, the statement goes on:
					
					 The stupid conservatives like Hong Jun Phyo, noisily trumpeting about "regrouping" and "grand unity", made last-ditch efforts to rally pro-Park elements in a bid to take power again through the snap "presidential election" in south Korea. It seemed like the last burlesque of deranged ones.
					
					 It was reminiscent of vipers pouncing again after having a smell of blood though they were hit hard.
					
					 More disgusting is the signboard of "security crisis" and "elimination of forces following the north" put up by the conservative group in a bid to malignantly pull up the DPRK.
					
					 The conservative forces turned south Korea into a land of darkness ruled by fascism dating back to the medieval age where people's livelihood and rights are mercilessly violated, and extremely escalated confrontation with the compatriots in the north through mad-cap war drills.
					
					 That's why the south Korean people already branded the conservative group as heinous accomplices of Park Geun Hye, when the high-profile political scandal broke out, and meted out a severe punishment on them.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation led by Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations, Saturday left here to attend the Belt and Road Forum for International Cooperation to be held in China.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mongolia
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mongolia
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from N. Enkhbayar, chairman of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party, on May 8.
					 The message wished the Korean people development and prosperity, happiness and wellbeing, extending warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the 1st anniversary of his election as chairman of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Certificate of Exploits from Kuwaiti Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Certificate of Exploits from Kuwaiti Organization
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a certificate of exploits from the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association on the lapse of one year since he was elected chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A ceremony took place in Kuwait.
					
					 Present there were the chairman and members of the association and the DPRK ambassador and his embassy officials in Kuwait.
					
					 The certificate was conveyed to the ambassador by Javid Ahmad, chairman of the association.
					
					 It was written on the certificate that the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association presents the certificate of exploits to respected HE Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Korean people, on the occasion of the first anniversary of his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Juvenile Football Contest Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Juvenile Football Contest Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- There took place matches among football classes of different schools in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 The 20 day-long matches were held, divided into three groups of primary, junior middle and senior middle schools, with over 90 teams attended.
					
					 The first places in boys' and girls' group matches were taken by Rangnang and Kwangbok primary schools in Rangnang and Mangyongdae districts, Kwangbok and Sangsin junior middle schools in Mangyongdae and Sosong districts and Kaeson and Namsin senior middle schools in Moranbong and Songyo districts respectively.
					
					 Winners will take part in the 7th national tournament of football classes slated for July on behalf of Pyongyang City.

articles.title: U.S. Keen on State-sponsored Terrorism against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Keen on State-sponsored Terrorism against DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) of the U.S. and the south Korean Intelligence Service (IS) recently hatched a plot to commit a state-sponsored terrorism targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK by use of bio-chemical substance.
					 It is a kind of state-sponsored terrorism aimed to undermine at any cost the single-minded unity of all the army and people of the DPRK rallied close around the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have long been engaged themselves in the state-sponsored terrorism against the DPRK.
					
					 In the 1950s, they provoked a war of aggression, a kind of state-sponsored terrorism, against the DPRK to eliminate it in its cradle and set such a detrimental precedent as degrading the UN to a lever for realizing their wild ambition to dominate the world.
					
					 Thereafter, the U.S. imperialists remained undisguised in their state-sponsored terrorism against the DPRK. It can be well evidenced by a series of their provocations like the spy ship Pueblo incident, the EC-121 large spy plane incident and Panmujom incident that aggravated the tension on the Korean Peninsula and might have led up to a new world war.
					
					 In the 1990s that witnessed the nuclear showdown between the DPRK and the U.S., the latter had tried to internationally isolate the former by branding it as a "nuclear criminal" in a bid to commit state-sponsored terrorism against it. After the military pressure upon the DPRK ended in a failure, the U.S. has resorted to persistent economic sanctions against it.
					
					 But the U.S. imperialists found that military pressure and economic sanctions can never work on the DPRK. Therefore, they are seeking a way out by means of heinous state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 In 2012 the U.S. imperialists instigated the south Korean puppet group to infiltrate terrorists into the DPRK in order to demolish the statues and grand monuments symbolic of the supreme dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 Recently, the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors went the length of hatching a plot to commit a bomb terrorism targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK during the event at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and the military parade and public procession. Moreover, they devised a method of hurting the supreme leadership by use of biochemical substances like radioactive or nano poisonous substances and assigned it to a terrorist.
					
					 But, the army and people of the DPRK will never remain an on-looker to the hideous state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 Now they are hardening their will to destroy the organizers of state-sponsored terrorism as well as their dens.

articles.title: Nukes Represent Supreme Interests of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nukes Represent Supreme Interests of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- World media and experts commented with sigh of relief that the dark clouds of a war hung over the Korean peninsula owing to the U.S. reckless military provocations were removed and one of crisis was over. This is because the DPRK stopped the tyrannical U.S. by the strategy of having access to powerful war deterrent and countering with it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary says that nukes serve as an absolute symbol of the dignity and strength of DPRK and its supreme interests.
					
					 It goes on;
					
					 As long as the U.S. does not roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK, it will redouble its measure for bolstering up its capabilities for self-defense with nuclear force as a pivot.
					
					 The U.S. should not hope for the DPRK's dismantlement of nukes in the least. And it should be mindful that it would suffer disgrace and destruction if it dare ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S., touting the anti-DPRK policy such as "maximum pressure and engagement", is trying to suffocate the DPRK with all-out sanctions and pressure. However, the U.S. is sadly mistaken. Obama's policy called "strategic patience" compelled the DPRK to have access to everything it desired. The Trump administration's adventurous "maximum pressure and engagement" will result in the DPRK's bolstering  up of nuclear deterrence at the highest speed.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' War Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' War Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean military have steadily escalated the situation with their military provocations, far from defusing the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary says that such moves can never be tolerated.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers' moves are a revelation of their dangerous scheme to ignite a new war through steady war games against the DPRK, not content with the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear strategic assets and aggression forces involved in such war drills are enough to conduct a total war.
					
					 But, the U.S. military threat does not go down with the DPRK. Though the U.S. deploy all kinds of nuclear strategic assets in south Korea and its vicinity to kick off a war for aggression, the DPRK remains unflinching as it has all means to counter any action.
					
					 Nuclear strategic assets are not a monopoly of the U.S. We are fully ready to face any mode of war chosen by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S., obsessed with the provocation of a nuclear war, and the pro-American lackeys blindly following it are bound to meet a miserable destruction by the Korean army and people's spirit of annihilating the enemies.

articles.title: Hwang Kyo An's Moves to Cover up Hideous Crimes of Park Geun Hye Flailed
articles.content:
Hwang Kyo An's Moves to Cover up Hideous Crimes of Park Geun Hye Flailed
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Hwang Kyo An of south Korea set tens of thousands of documents of Chongwadae including those related to traitor Park Geun Hye's whereabouts for seven hours at the time of ferry Sewol disaster as classified "presidential records" under protection for decades.
					 This is aimed to cover up the truth behind the high-profile crimes committed by Park, say leading newspapers of the DPRK in commentaries Saturday.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun brands such reckless action taken by Hwang as a deliberate move to help the conservative forces escape from total destruction and as an unpardonable insult and challenge to the south Korean public, including the bereaved families of the victims of the ferry disaster who sternly punished the thrice-cursed traitor.
					
					 It says:
					
					 Such behavior made it clearer that Hwang is the target of elimination just like Park.
					
					 Park's crimes just mean Hwang's crimes, and if Hwang is allowed to go scot-free, it is just like allowing Park to go with impunity.
					
					 Lurking behind the ill-minded move of Hwang is also his sinister intention to prolong his remaining days and appear as the boss of the conservative group by having his "feat" of protecting "value of conservatism" acknowledged.
					
					 It is quite clear that the spirit of the public candlelight actions, which swept south Korea to get rid of social evils and bring about new politics and life, can never come true unless the thrice-cursed villains like Hwang, the corrupt conservative forces, are completely thrown overboard.
					
					 Minju Joson says that no matter how hard traitor Hwang works tries, he can neither cover up the heinous crimes he committed in league with traitor Park nor avoid public criticism of his group.

articles.title: S. Korean Confrontation Maniacs' Moves to Stifle Compatriots in North under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Confrontation Maniacs' Moves to Stifle Compatriots in North under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. House of Representatives recently passed "North Korea Interdiction and Modernization of Sanctions Act". No sooner had the news of the anti-DPRK act been adopted in the U.S. House of Representatives than the south Korean puppet group zealously welcomed it, saying that it "reflected the resolute will to cope with the nukes in the north" and it would be "an occasion of warning the north once again."
					 This is a disgraceful behavior of the dolts failing to see the poor situation of the master much upset by the invincible might and vigorous advance of the DPRK and an epileptic fit of the confrontation maniacs trying to stifle the fellow countrymen, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 These days the U.S. escalates an anti-DPRK campaign, cooking up all forms of sanctions acts. In fact, it is nothing but the last expedient to maintain the outdated hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean puppet group cries out for confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, clinging to the coattail of outsiders, ignorant of the trend of the times. The group is the root cause of disaster to the nation that should be removed as early as possible. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group at the door of the grave should know that its bid to block the DPRK's advance with sanctions and pressure is as foolish an act as trying to get the sun eclipsed by palms.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will surely build a prosperous socialist power, holding higher the invincible nuclear treasured sword and the banner of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Indict Stooges of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Indict Stooges of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Organizations of south Korea, including the Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment and the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment, reportedly indicted Hwang Kyo An, Kim Kwan Jin, Yun Pyong Se and Han Min Gu, stooges of Park Geun Hye over the THAAD deployment on May 11.
					 Those stooges had consistently asserted that the U.S. would shoulder the expenses for THAAD deployment, but the Trump administration rendered a bill of one billion U.S. dollars last month and the former regime accepted it, the organizations charged.
					
					 They demanded a strict probe into the case and a stern punishment of those criminals.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Praise Exploits of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Praise Exploits of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on May 2 to mark the 1st anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK at its Seventh Congress.
					
					 This is an event of great historic significance and an expression of the boundless trust and ardent reverence of all the party members, service personnel and people for Kim Jong Un who has performed distinguished exploits in building a socialist power and reunifying the country.
					
					 He saw to it that the country's military deterrent has been bolstered up in every way.
					
					 Under his leadership, the party, army and people of the DPRK are only winning victories despite the vicious moves of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces.
					
					 Korea's reunification will surely come true, as it is led by the outstanding leader.
					
					 The DPRK has a rosy future.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Italy
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Italy brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" on April 28 to mark the Day of the Sun and the army day.
					 The work, published on February 25, Juche 103 (2014), clarifies that the whole course of the Korean revolution can be called a period of ideological work to give the fullest play to the might of the truth of the revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways facing the field of the party ideological work at present.

articles.title: Arab Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People Formed
articles.content:
Arab Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People Formed
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Arab Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People was formed in Cairo of Egypt on May 2.
					 Zaher al Khatib, secretary general of the Lebanon Federation of Workers who is chairman of the Lebanese Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea, and Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt who is chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, were elected co-chairmen of the regional committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre la exposicion del MINFAP
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre la exposicion del MINFAP
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio la sede de exposicion de los instrumentos y herramientas, los materiales de construccion de acabado y los exitos cientifico-tecnicos del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares. 
					En esta ocasion se exhibieron 131 mil 620 instrumentos y herramientas y materiales de construccion de acabado de 550 variedades, presentados por las unidades de construccion y de produccion de materiales de construccion del EPC, y mas de 530 exitos cientifico-tecnicos. 
					
					Mirando los objetos exhibidos, el Maximo Dirigente dijo muy complacido que esta exposicion se ha mejorado bastante en comparacion con la edicion de hace dos anos y muestra un paisaje peculiar de la era dorada de construccion y agrego que se ha registrado una gran innovacion en el dominio de construccion. 
					
					Senalo que los inventos expuestos convienen a la constitucion fisica del coreano y son comodos de manejar.
					
					Aprecio los materiales y accesorios de construccion y los muebles de muchas variedades y de buena calidad e instruyo dinamizar la campana para producir los materiales de construccion con recursos nacionales y diversificar sus generos y colores de acuerdo con el proposito del Partido. 
					
					Afirmo que las masas tienen inagotable fuerza e inteligencia y pueden hacer todo lo decidido y destaco que se debe inventar y fabricar a nuestro estilo los equipos y materiales de construccion dejando la idea de importarlos de otros paises. 
					
					Prosiguio que los sectores civiles deben aprender el modo de lucha y trabajo de los militares del EPC. 
					
					Presento las tareas que incumben al sector enfatizando que esta exposicion es una oportunidad muy importante para continuar la era de esplendor de la construccion. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las FAP de la RPDC, y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Kim Jong Gwan, viceministro de las FAP.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con activistas de la rama de construccion del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con activistas de la rama de construccion del EPC
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto con los activistas de la rama de construccion del EPC. 
					Cuando el salio al lugar de filmacion, los participantes le dieron calida bienvenida dirigiendole el maximo honor y el mas profundo agradecimiento. 
					
					El Comandante Supremo felicito a ellos que crean de modo multiple y sucesivo las leyendas de construccion de la Corea heroica.
					
					Se fotografio con los participantes mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos hayan dado un golpe duro a los enemigos deseosos de atropellar a nuestro pais y manifestado a todo el mundo el inagotable poderio estatal, la potencialidad de desarrollo y el impetu inflexible de la Corea socialista, al construir con el espiritu de ofensiva "De un tiron" las creaciones monumentales que muestran el futuro del arte arquitectonico de tipo jucheano y el nivel de civilizacion socialista. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares de la RPDC, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Kim Jong Gwan, viceministro de las FAP, y otros comandantes del EPC.

articles.title: Representacion Permanente ante la ONU publica comunicado sobre posicion del gobierno de la RPDC
articles.content:
Representacion Permanente ante la ONU publica comunicado sobre posicion del gobierno de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que llegan al extremo las maniobras hostiles de EE.UU. contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el abuso del poder por parte del Comite del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, establecido acorde a la Resolucion 1718 sobre la RPDC, la Representacion Permanente de la RPDC ante la ONU publico el dia 11 un comunicado para aclarar la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC.
					En estos tiempos, EE.UU. recurre a la necia artimana para incrementar la atmosfera de sancion anti-RPDC celebrando continuamente por conducto del Comite en la sede de la ONU las reuniones informativas a puertas cerradas para los paises de cada grupo regional, las cuales no tienen precedentes en la historia de la organizacion multinacional, comienza el documento y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. alza su voz ante los Estados miembros senalando que muchos paises no estan enfrascados plenamente en la implementacion de las "resoluciones de sancion" contra la RPDC y hasta obliga a otros a la implementacion amenazando abiertamente que ellos pueden enfrentar "fuertes medidas de sancion" de EE.UU. si no implementan o se muestran poco interesados en cumplir su obligacion de implementar las "resoluciones de sancion". 
					
					 Esto comprueba la ilegalidad y la injusticia de las "resoluciones de sancion" que han sido fabricadas e impuestas por EE.UU. contra la RPDC. 
					
					 No hay otra manera que interpretar como acto de arrogancia el hecho de que el Comite del Consejo de Seguridad cuestiona como "actos ilegales" hasta los normales asuntos comerciales y la operacion de restaurantes entre los paises dando vuelco e interpretando sobremanera la "resolucion" de la ONU que estipula claramente que no se propone dar consecuencias humanitarias adversas para la poblacion civil de la RPDC o afectar negativamente sus actividades, incluyendo las economicas y la cooperacion. 
					
					  Si el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU considera legitimas sus "resoluciones de sancion", no tendria ninguna razon para no responder a la reiterada propuesta de la RPDC sobre la organizacion del forum internacional de los especialistas de derecho para aclarar la base legal de las "resoluciones". 
					
					Antes de obligar a otros paises la implementacion de las "resoluciones", el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU debera reconsiderar por que ellas no se han implementado e intentar aclarar su legalidad en el forum propuesto. 
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC rechaza totalmente las demenciales maniobras hostiles de EE.UU. y el Comite del Consejo de Seguridad, que se cometen bajo el pretexto de sancion, calificandolas como crimen de lesa humanidad encaminado a violar la soberania de la RPDC y el derecho a la subsistencia del pueblo coreano y hacerla volver a la sociedad obscura despreciando hasta los fundamentos del derecho internacional y los conocimientos elementales de los asuntos comerciales legitimos.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRN condena intento de resucitar oscurantismo en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRN condena intento de resucitar oscurantismo en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tanto para el pais y la nacion como para el desarrollo sano y el futuro de la sociedad surcoreana, la horda de conservadores surcoreanos debe ser eliminada una vez por todas.
					 Exige asi el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional en su declaracion publicada el dia 13 y continua:
					
					  Condenados a la severa sentencia, ellos estan empantanados ahora en el charco de la historia en que cayeron por haber cometido imperdonables crimenes desafiando a la opinion publica y a la corriente de tendencia actual. 
					
					  En las recientes elecciones "presidenciales", Hong Jun Phyo y otros connotados elementos conservadores trataron de arrebatar de nuevo el poder agrupando la chusma partidaria de Park Geun-hye y reclamando la "reagrupacion" y la "gran unidad", lo cual fue la ultima payasada de los deformados y trastornados mentalmente.
					
					  La campana para reagrupar a los dispersados elementos conservadores hizo recordar el enredo de las viboras.
					
					  Lo mas repugnante del caso es que ellos acusaron perversamente a la RPDC tomando como consigna de reagrupacion la "crisis de seguridad" y la "liquidacion de fuerzas seguidoras al Norte".
					
					  Lo que hizo hasta ahora el poder conservador es haber convertido el Sur de Corea en la tierra medieval de fascismo y oscurantismo y el infierno para la vida y derechos del pueblo y extremado la confrontacion fratricida con su fiebre belica anti-Norte.
					
					  Por esta razon, cuando ocurrio el escandalo politico sin precedentes, los habitantes surcoreanos ya condenaron a la pena capital a Park Geun-hye, diabla de Chongwadae, y todos sus complices conservadores.

articles.title: Comite coreano contra lavado de dinero remite carta a organizacion internacional
articles.content:
Comite coreano contra lavado de dinero remite carta a organizacion internacional
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que fue descubierta recientemente la conspiracion de terrorismo de Estado urdida por la Agencia Central de Inteligencia (CIA) de Estados Unidos y el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia (SNI) del Sur de Corea contra la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Comite Nacional de Coordinacion de la RPDC sobre el Anti-lavado de Dinero y Anti-Financiacion del Terrorismo envio el dia 12 una carta a la Fuerza Encargada de Accion Financiera contra el Lavado de Dinero.
					La misiva recuerda que la CIA y el SNI sobornaron a un ciudadano de la RPDC de apellido Kim, le trasladaron en varias ocasiones mucho dinero ilegal para el terrorismo y le dieron la orden de cometer el atentado dinamitero contra la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC, y continua:
					
					Este suceso demuestra que el complot terrorista de categoria especial de esos organos de inteligencia contra la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC llegan a la etapa tan peligrosa que no se puede tolerar mas.
					
					A la Fuerza Encargada de Accion Financiera contra el Lavado de Dinero, que tiene la mision de prevenir en escala mundial el lavado de dinero y la financiacion al terrorismo y a la proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo, recae la responsabilidad de prestar debida atencion a la presente conspiracion tramada en conjunto por las instituciones de inteligencia de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea y de prevenirla.
					
					Esa entidad internacional de control financiero debera acusar a los paises, que organizaron y se confabularon en el reciente caso terrorista, y tomar urgentes contramedidas en virtud del articulo correspondiente de la norma internacional que exige incriminar todas formas de apoyo financiero al terrorismo.
					
					Ademas, debera cooperar activamente en buscar y castigar duro hasta al ultimo de los organizadores, complices y seguidores del complot.
					
					Esta vez, quedo descubierto y frustrado a tiempo el complot terrorista porque rigen en la RPDC la ley y reglamentos rigurosos para la prevencion de lavado de dinero y terrorismo y funciona el ordenado sistema estatal para la implementacion consecuente de ellos.
					
					Por ultimo, la carta exige fuertemente una vez mas al aparato internacional prestar atencion al llamamiento de la RPDC y expresa la seguridad de que esta contribuira mucho a los esfuerzos de la sociedad internacional por erradicar el terrorismo, al cumplir con sinceridad, en estrecha cooperacion con el aparato, la norma internacional para la prevencion de lavado de dinero y la financiacion al terrorismo y a la proliferacion de armas de destruccion masiva.

articles.title: Delegacion gubernamental coreana parte con rumbo a China
articles.content:
Delegacion gubernamental coreana parte con rumbo a China
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- La delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Kim Yong Jae, salio hoy de esta capital para participar en el Forum Zona y Camino para la Cooperacion Internacional que se abrira en China.
